content.rendered:
Gambling is a popular form of entertainment in the UK in which sports betting holds a great deal of importance. Betting has been historically linked with sports. Sports betting in the United Kingdom have quite some historical significance and have been continuing for centuries. It has been carefully regulated and almost restricted for a few decades but recently went under relaxation after the legalization of betting activities in the Act of 1960. 

Since Britons are all about their horse racing, there is a huge market for betting on horse racing. The majority of the gambling activities are regarding the same form of betting. To the people, it is available in the form of bookmakers or sites that are regulated by and acknowledged jurisdiction mostly the United Kingdom Gambling Commission. Races that take place significantly for horses and greyhounds and also football are among the top sports that have gained popularity with time. The UK opens up a huge market for bookmakers. The last decade witnessed massive growth in this industry. 

Preference of the British Punters 

In the arena of gambling, it is predominantly the sports betting industry that leads, and football is considered the dominant sports there, it is inevitable for football betting to be the most popular option for gamblers in the UK. Those Brits use to place bets at NonStopCasino’s gambling sites that take credit cards.  Virtual sports, tennis, cricket are among some other popular options for betting. 

Statistical Outlook 

Studies conducted in the UK adding to the data which is extracted from the reports of United Kingdom Gambling Commission, the gross profit shows a yield of 2 billion pounds which is noted between 2016 October and 2017 September of sports betting online among which 786 million pounds are from football bets this consists of 40% of the entire yield. The second on the list is horse racing. Horse racing has a gross of 569 million pounds.  

The Online Sports Betting Industry Demographics in the UK 

45% of the citizens who were interviewed by the United Kingdom Gambling Commission (UKGC) in the year 2017 have had an experience of gambling in the last month. Studies show punters have used more laptops than mobile phones while placing their bets. There are a plethora of online bookmaking sites that are growing in popularity nowadays. 

Endorsements and Advertisements 

Sports gambling with all its popularity were a regular topic for advertisement in mainstream media like TVs and radios. This created it also a lot of hassle as these ads were exposed to people who are younger than the lowest limit of gambling age. This required the government to step up and take control of the situation. Hence there was unrest regarding the same issue. 

Laws Regarding Sports Betting Industry 

There are some strict laws to support the gaming community as well as to continue the betting industry. The land-based sportsbook options have been there throughout generations in the UK. After 1960 these operators achieved legitimacy in the country. There has been a time when these sports book shops were leading the gambling scenes. 

While some brick and mortar sportsbook brands dominated and almost monopolized the industry, now it is there are few online sportsbook options better said to be topping the charts. The British government passed a law in which an additional percentage of 15 was imposed as a tax on offshore-based local bookmakers. Instead of facing backlashes from the public, the government remained update and UK stands as one of the most competent jurisdictions when it comes to sports betting. 

Towards the Safety of UK Bettors 

The competition between the bookmakers owing to the market saturation opens a door of opportunities for the UK-based sports bettors. Due to the rules of safety measures according to the government and the influence of responsible gaming programs, safe gambling practices, vulnerable punters are protected and under-aged sports betting is considered illegal. 

Safety Measures 

The United Kingdom Gambling Commission has control over the functioning is of all online and offline operators so it is considered the safest sports betting jurisdiction in the world. The London Stock Exchange features many of the online sportsbooks as tradable commodities. The numerous schemes and policies, namely GamStop, GamBan, GamCare, etc have been meticulously designed to help and prohibit problem gamblers from indulging in gambling.

Conclusion 

Sports betting is intertwined with the lives of punters dwelling in the UK and it has been for several decades. Considering the popularity of the same among young adults, it can be considered as a fast-growing industry, and also it is there to stay. There is no doubt about the safety measures taken by the government and also the success of the entire industry in the global market.
